title: Stuck in champ select?
body: Stuck in champ select at 0 with nothing happening. Repeatedly pressed lock in, didnt dodge at 0 and sat in champ select for about a minute, after closing don't think it counted as a dodge, just curious what it is

replies.body: Happened to me too, now I can't queue for any game.  It freezes when I queue and then eventually shuts down.
happened to me as well. I can queue up for non-dynamic queue games. like normal blinds and ARAMS.

Hey guys, I know this was resolved, but I just wanted to close the loop on this:

There was an issue in which players were getting stuck in Champ Select and not able to start a game.  We started seeing lots of reports, we investigated, and did essentially a restart of the Champion Select system.  While this should have resolved the problem, it may have kicked some players out of Champ Select seemingly at random.  For any players booted out of Champ Select forcibly, you should not have encountered any penalties.

Hope this sheds some light on what happened!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YntaUcF6,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-06-14T20:56:33.890+0000)

http://imgur.com/XXuzGKN

This is most definitely not resolved, I've been experiencing this issue multiple times in the past few weeks. Sometimes it happens when it's my turn to pick or ban, sometimes it occurs when another player is picking/banning. I can't figure out how to reproduce it, as it occurs seemingly randomly for me. Sometimes it'll happen multiple times a day, other times it won't occur for a week. I've been scouring the boards for a fix, and the only thing I'm seeing is that it's "fixed," even though there's still a multitude of recent posts regarding the issue.
Dynamic queue died <3 riots listening to us Yay!!!
